content.description: The question refers to the images shown.
content.question: Through both its form and its symbolism, the Vietnam Veterans Memorial is most similar to which of the following works?

choices.label: A Book from the Sky by Xu Bing

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe similarities and/or differences in two or more works of art using appropriate and relevant points of comparison.
